title: Enhancing AI Practical Competencies: Gamification-Based Process Simulation Instructional Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can implement three or more gamification elements for process simulation education using participatory design techniques.
Learners can interpret mathematical modeling and simulation results by analyzing microbial conversion process case studies.
Learners can develop and receive evaluations for one smartphone-based interactive simulation prototype per team

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
